quoteText: Not everybody has a law degree or speak English natively, so we have added helpful tl;dr (“too long. didn’t read”) in plain English that summarize each term. These are only meant to help you understand the general meaning and are not legally binding terms of service!
title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: Both the Terms of service and Privacy policy contain "tl;dr" sections to summarize each term in plain English.
